project_descr: The project focuses on local cap development for dialogue, participatory planning, quality of public services, p'ships and capacities for strategic investments in municipalities under the influence of large scale mining projects

outputs.output_descr: Establishing a local dialogue/ consultation mechanism and through it formulating a long-term development strategy for the territory in question (in all pilot municipalities)
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

outputs.output_descr: Formulating and implementing partnership strategy and communications plan in support of  a long-term development strategy for the territory in question (in all pilot municipalities)
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

outputs.output_descr: Recommending and implementing a fin management, investment and project management mechanism in the pilot municipalities
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

outputs.output_descr: Evaluating and codifying lessons learnt and methodology, dissemination, knowledge management
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management
